import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove user as ticket follower"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/followers/user/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes a user from the ticket's follower list so they no longer receive notifications about updates. Use this to clean up watchers when a user no longer needs visibility on a ticket.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **userId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-followers) or [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) and extract `Item.Users[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the ticket and the follower to remove.
2. [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/user/\{userId\}](/docs/api/tickets/remove-ticket-follower-user).
3. Verify the follower list using [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-followers).

**Minimal Required Fields**: ticketId, userId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"userId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the user to remove as follower","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
